name: Rewardable
description: REWARD is the utility token of Rewardable, an AI-powered platform that connects users with brands and Web3 projects through a task-to-earn model. The platform enables users to earn tokens by completing tasks and micro-jobs, offering an intuitive and accessible interface for participants, including individuals new to digital earning opportunities. Rewardable is designed to appeal to a broad audience, particularly Gen Z and college students seeking flexible ways to earn online.
